name: Ryan Castañeda
intro: A ninja when it comes to text editors, good with arrays and objects, can bend the DOM at will, has OCD in indentations, commas and nested code. An aspiring developer who wants to make the world a better place through innovations in technology.

portfolio.name: Tunes
portfolio.description: Tunes is a Music Discovery Service that allows Music Artists or Music Providers to import their music into Tunes.™  for others to discover. Allow all partners who signed the Tunes.™ contract to search for Music to use.

portfolio.name: Freedom!
portfolio.description: Freedom! is the fastest growing MCN and the largest by channel count. Freedom! MCN is a YouTube Multi-Channel Network that allows channels and networks alike to produce videos under its’ name. Freedom! members get access to tricks and techniques to be able to grow faster and reach a bigger crowd. Freedom! is currently one of the largest MCN on YouTube with over 50 000 channels.

portfolio.name: Games.TM
portfolio.description: Games.tm provides you with a list of games supported by any.tv with their Play Now link which you can copy to your videos so you can start earning revenue. Games.tm also provides the status of your videos even if you have multiple Play Now links on your videos.
